channel.title: Make money with Rewarding Ways :)
channel.description:
I know most sites are 'scams' or whatever but I seemed to have earned a bit of money now using this site and I thought I'd advertise it a bit; I just didn't know where to start. So yeah, here's my very small amount of payment(just to test if the site works) and the links to the site:) If this post isn't allowed please comment and tell me or if you are a moderator immediately inform me and/or remove this topic, thanks :) Happy money making!
Click the banner below to go to the site :) [url=http://www.rewardingways.com/][img]http://www.rewardingways.com/images/banners/3.gif[/img][/url]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2q9l0dh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/t9zihu.jpg[/img]

item.title: Make money with Rewarding Ways :)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Jc already made a thread for these. Plus you’re not allowed to ‘force’ people to use your ref feral, you can post the actual link and then the site link with your referral for people to optionally click if they feel like supporting you.

Read full topic

item.title: Make money with Rewarding Ways :)
item.dc:creator: @plops plops
item.description:
@plops wrote:

I’m only 16 and I do have a part-time job. This is just some extra money for when I’m bored and have the time to do it, besides with the right amount of referrals and good techniques you can earn money by virtually doing nothing. Thanks for sharing your opinions anyway though

-Nothing:

EDIT: And that guy knows it, he just wants free $ by referrals.

EDIT: You don’t have to sign up with me as your referral, in fact, I’m not bothered at all. I’m getting payed either way. Not to start an argument or anything, I’m just posting this out of free will, and if anybody else have any legit sites then feel free to post. I don’t mind constructive criticism either.

Read full topic

item.title: Make money with Rewarding Ways :)
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

BloodRayne:

These sites are an incredible waste of time, if you value your time at all I’d suggest staying away from them completely and looking for a real job…

Indeed. You get like 5$ for 1 hour and it’s really…really…really boring.

EDIT: And that guy knows it, he just wants free $ by referrals.

Read full topic
